basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: You may discard a card to add 1 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">2</label>) plus its adventure deck number to your check to defeat a non-villain monster. If undefeated, return it to the top of its location deck. Other characters may not play cards or use powers on this check.
At the end of your turn, you may recharge any number of weapons (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or allies or items).

glory hound.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

glory hound.desc: You may discard a card to add 1 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>) plus its adventure deck number to your check to defeat a non-villain monster. If undefeated, return it to the top (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or under the top) of its location deck. Other characters may not play cards or use powers on this check.
At the end of your turn, you may recharge any number of weapons (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or allies or items).

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you play an ally to explore your location, you may add your Diplomacy skill and the Mental trait to your Melee checks (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or checks to acquire items) during that exploration.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When another character at your location would encounter a monster (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or a weapon), discard (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or recharge) a card; you encounter it instead.

lancer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

lancer.desc: You may discard a card to add 1 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">2</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>) plus its adventure deck number to your check to defeat a non-villain monster. If undefeated, return it to the top of its location deck. Other characters may not play cards or use powers on this check. (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>If defeated, recharge a random card from your discard pile.)
At the end of your turn, you may recharge any number of weapons (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or allies or items).

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> Recharge a card (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or put it on top of your deck) to search your deck or discard pile for a card that has the Mount trait and add it to your hand.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you would discard a weapon that has the Polearm or Spear trait for its power, recharge it instead (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or shuffle it into your deck) (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or put it on top of your deck).

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> On your turn, discard a card that has the Mount trait (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>or put it on the top of your deck) to move to another location and examine the top card of that location deck. If it is a monster, you may encounter it.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

basic.desc: After you play a spell that has the Attack trait, banish it.
You may discard a spell to draw a random monster from the box.

When you defeat a monster and would banish it, you may add it to your hand instead. You may banish a monster from your hand to draw a card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or add 1d4 to any check to defeat a barrier) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or to any check to acquire a weapon, an armor, or an item).

eidolomancer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

eidolomancer.desc: After you play a spell that has the Attack trait, banish it.
You may discard a spell to draw a random monster from the box.

When you defeat a monster and would banish it, you may add it to your hand (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>and you may draw a card) instead. You may banish a monster from your hand to draw a card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or add 1d4 to any check to defeat a barrier) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or to any check to acquire a weapon, an armor, or an item) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or move after an encounter) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or reroll your failed combat check).

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> While you are displaying a cohort that has the Eidolon trait, you may use your Strength skill instead of your Constitution or Fortitude (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or Dexterity or Stealth) skill on your checks.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When a character plays a blessing on your Strength check, you may add 1d12 instead of the normal die. (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>If the blessing has the Basic trait, it may be recharged instead of discarded.)

tyrannomancer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

tyrannomancer.desc: After you play a spell that has the Attack trait, banish it. (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>After you play a spell that does not have the Attack trait, you may draw a card.)
You may discard (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or recharge) a spell to draw a random monster from the box.

When you defeat a monster and would banish it, you may add it to your hand (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>and you may shuffle a random monster from the box into your deck) instead. You may banish a monster from your hand (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or discard pile) to draw a card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or add 1d4 to any check to defeat a barrier) (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or to any check to acquire a weapon, an armor, or an item) (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or reduce damage dealt to a character at your location by 3) (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or add 1d6 to any combat check by a character at your location).

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> Add 1d8 to any check by a character at your location against a summoned monster. (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>When you defeat a summoned monster, you may draw a random monster from the box.)

basic.desc: When you attempt a check to acquire a spell (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or an item), you may use your Knowledge skill in place of any listed skill.
After you play a spell, you may recharge a random spell from your discard pile.

Discard a spell to reduce Cold or Fire (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or Acid, Electricity, or Force) damage dealt to you (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or to any character at your location) to 0.

eldritch savant.desc: When you attempt a check to acquire a spell (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or an item), you may use your Knowledge skill in place of any listed skill.
After you play a spell, you may recharge a random spell from your discard pile (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> or shuffle it into your deck).

Discard (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or recharge) a spell to reduce Cold or Fire (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or Acid, Electricity, or Force) damage dealt to you (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or to any character at your location) to 0.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may discard a card to examine the top card of your deck (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>and you may recharge the examined card); if it is a spell, you may add it to your hand.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you play a spell that has the Cold or Fire (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or Acid, Electricity, or Force) traits, you may replace any one of those traits with another of those traits.

occularium scholar.desc: When you attempt a check to acquire a spell (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or an item) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or you attempt to defeat a barrier), you may use your Knowledge skill in place of any listed skill.
After you play a spell, you may recharge a random spell from your discard pile.

Discard a spell (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or a boon that has the Book trait) to reduce Cold or Fire (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or Acid, Electricity, or Force) damage dealt to you (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or to any character at your location) to 0.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may reveal a boon that has the Book trait to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">+2</label>) to your check.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> At the start of your turn, you may recharge a boon that has the Book trait to examine the top 3 cards of your location deck, or recharge a spell to examine the top 3 cards of your deck. (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>Put them back in any order.)

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: You may evade a bane you encounter that has the Animal or Vermin (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or Demon) trait; otherwise, add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>2d4) to your checks against it.
When you would bury or discard a weapon that has the Ranged trait for its power, you may recharge it instead.

demonslayer.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

demonslayer.desc: You may evade a bane you encounter that has the Animal or Vermin (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or Demon) trait (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>and you may put it on top of its location deck); otherwise, add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>2d4) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>2d6) to your checks against it.
When you would bury or discard a weapon that has the Ranged trait for its power, you may recharge it instead.
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you attempt a Knowledge check against a monster, you may use your Survival skill instead of your Knowledge skill.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> If you would fail a check against a bane that has the Demon trait, you may reroll 1 die; take the new result.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> On the first exploration of your turn, if you defeat a bane that has the Demon trait, you may explore again.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> You may recharge a card to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9">+1</label>) to another character's check to defeat a bane that has the Demon trait.

abyssal walker.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

abyssal walker.desc: You may evade a bane you encounter that has the Animal or Vermin (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or Demon) trait; otherwise, add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>2d4) to your checks against it.
When you would bury or discard a weapon that has the Ranged trait for its power, you may recharge it instead.

<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> At the start (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or end) of your turn, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or 2 cards) of your location deck (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>and you may move to a location that has the Abyssal trait).

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you close (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or a character at your location closes) a location that has the Abyssal trait, you may acquire a boon from your location deck.

<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label> On your turn, if you are at a location that has the Abyssal trait, you may discard the top card of your deck (<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>or a card from your hand) to ignore your location's At This Location power until the end of the turn.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: <input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label> You gain the skill Perception: Wisdom +2.

You may recharge (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or reveal) a card that has the Divine or Ranged trait to add 1d4 and the Divine and Magic traits to your check against a monster.
When you defeat a monster on your turn, you may roll d6; on a (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location.

wandering judge.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

wandering judge.desc: <input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label> You gain the skill Perception: Wisdom +2.

You may recharge (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or reveal) a card that has the Divine or Ranged trait to add 1d4 and the Divine and Magic traits to your check against a monster.

When you defeat a monster on your turn, you may roll d6; on a (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>and before you explore, you may draw a card). (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Add 1d4 to your checks during this exploration.)

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> Recharge a card that has the Ranged or Divine trait to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">+2</label>) to a combat check at another location.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you play a blessing that matches the top card of the blessings discard pile, you may shuffle the top card of the blessings discard pile into the blessings deck.
<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label> Add 2 to your check to acquire an ally or a blessing.

cold iron warden.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

cold iron warden.desc: <input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label> You gain the skill Perception: Wisdom +2.

You may recharge (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or reveal) a card that has the Divine or Ranged trait to add 1d4 and the Divine and Magic traits to your check against a monster. (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>If that monster has the Cultist trait, add another 1d8.)

When you defeat a monster on your turn, (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>you may examine the top card of your location deck, and if it is not a monster, put it on the bottom of the location deck, then) you may roll d6; on a (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">3</label>,) 4, 5, or 6, explore your location.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you attempt a Diplomacy check, you may use your Strength skill instead of your Diplomacy skill.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you play a blessing that has the Basic trait on any check to defeat a bane, you may recharge it (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or put it on top of your deck) instead of discarding it.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> You may evade a barrier you encounter (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>and you may put it on the bottom of its location deck).

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: For your check to defeat a bane that has the Demon or Undead trait, you may recharge a spell (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or blessing) to use your Divine skill + 1d8 and add the Attack, Divine, and Magic traits.

When you use the above power or play a blessing that does not have the Corrupted trait on another character’s (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or your) check to defeat, a character at your location may shuffle 1 random card from his discard pile into his deck after the check.

dawnflower's flare.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

dawnflower's flare.desc: For your check to defeat a bane that has the Demon or Undead trait, you may recharge (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or shuffle into your deck) a spell (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or blessing) to use your Divine skill + 1d8 (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>2d8) and add the Attack, Divine, and Magic traits. (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>You may add an additional 1d8 and the Fire trait.)

When you use the above power or play a blessing that does not have the Corrupted trait on another character's (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or your) check to defeat, a character at your location may shuffle 1 random card from his discard pile into his deck after the check.
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> When you play a blessing on your check to defeat a bane that has the Demon or Undead trait, you may recharge that blessing.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">+2</label>) to your check to recharge a card that has the Attack trait.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When another character plays a Blessing of Sarenrae on your check, that character may recharge it (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>and a random card from her discard pile).

everlight's grace.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

everlight's grace.desc: For your check to defeat a bane that has the Demon or Undead trait, you may recharge a spell (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or blessing) to use your Divine skill + 1d8 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>2d6) and add the Attack, Divine, and Magic traits.

When you use the above power or play a blessing that does not have the Corrupted trait on another character’s (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or your) check to defeat, a character at your location may shuffle 1 random card (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>of a type of your choice) from his discard pile into his deck after the check.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you play a boon that has the Healing trait on a character, any armors (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or allies) that would be shuffled into that character's deck may be put into that character's hand instead. (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>Then you may recharge the boon.)

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> When you (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or a character at your location) would bury an armor for its power, that character may discard it instead.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: When you attempt a check before you act, you may use your Charisma skill instead of any listed skill.

You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) to any check by a character at your location. (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>If that character defeats a monster on that check, he may draw a card.)
When you acquire a boon that has the Corrupted trait, bury it.

inheritor's blade.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

inheritor's blade.desc: When you attempt a check before you act, you may use your Charisma skill instead of any listed skill.

You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) to any check by a character at your location. (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>If that character defeats a monster on that check, he may draw a card.) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>If the top card has the Heavy Armor or Sword trait, recharge it instead of discarding it.)

When you acquire a boon that has the Corrupted trait, bury it. (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>If it does not have that trait, you may give it to a character at your location.)

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> You may be dealt 1 Combat damage to reduce Combat (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or any type of) damage dealt to a character at your location by 1 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">2</label>) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">3</label>).

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you play a blessing that has the Iomedae trait, a character at your location may shuffle an ally in their discard pile into his deck.

wardstone sentry.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

wardstone sentry.desc: When you attempt a check before you act, you may use your Charisma skill (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+4</label>) instead of any listed skill.

You may discard the top card of your deck to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">+3</label>) to any check by a character at your location. (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>If that character defeats a monster on that check, he may draw a card.)
When you acquire a boon that has the Corrupted trait, bury it. (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>If it is your turn, you may then explore again.)
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> You may add 1d8 and the Magic trait to your check to defeat a bane that has the Demon (□ or Undead) trait.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When another character encounters a monster that has the Cultist or Demon trait, you may immediately move to his location.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: At the start of your turn, you may search your deck or your discard pile for a cohort (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or a card that has the Animal trait) and put it into your hand, then recharge a card.
You may recharge a card to evade a summoned bane (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or discard a card to allow another character to do so).

pack leader.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

pack leader.desc: At the start of your turn, you may search your deck or your discard pile for a cohort (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or a card that has the Animal trait) and put it into your hand, then recharge a card.
You may recharge a card to evade a summoned bane (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or discard a card to allow another character to do so).

<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> Before you would discard an ally for its power, you may recharge a random card (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or a random card that has the Animal trait) from your discard pile.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> You may reveal a card that has the Animal trait to add 1d4 (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">+2</label>) to your combat check (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or your check).

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> You may recharge a card that has the Animal trait to reduce Combat damage dealt to you by 2, or bury (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>or discard) a card that has the Animal trait to reduce all damage dealt to you to 0.

blight scout.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

blight scout.desc: At the start of your turn, you may search your deck or your discard pile for a cohort (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or a card that has the Animal trait) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or a weapon) and put it into your hand, then recharge a card.
You may recharge a card to evade a summoned bane (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or discard a card to allow another character to do so).

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> You may recharge a card to reduce damage dealt to you before you act to 1 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">0</label>).
<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may shuffle a cohort into your deck to add your Stealth skill to your combat check.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you examine the top of a location deck, you may recharge a card to examine an additional card.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> Add 1d4 (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>1d8) to your non-combat check if you are at a location that has the Abyssal trait.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: You may bury a card to add 1d10 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) and the Electricity or Force trait to your Strength, Melee, or Arcane check; if the check has the Attack trait, you may recharge the card instead.
When you defeat a monster, you may move or put the bottom card of your deck on top of your deck, then end your turn.
<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> You gain the skill Arcane: Charisma +3.

mauler.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

mauler.desc: You may bury a card to add 1d10 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+3</label>) and the Electricity or Force trait to your Strength, Melee, or Arcane check; if the check (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or the card) has the Attack trait, you may recharge the card instead.
When you defeat a monster, you may move or put the bottom card of your deck on top of your deck, then end your turn.
<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> You gain the skill Arcane: Charisma +3.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> Before you act, you may deal 2 Electricity or Force damage to all characters at your location to add 1d8 and the Magic and Electricity or Force traits to your combat check.
<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> Reduce damage dealt to you before you act by 1 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8">2</label>).
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you discard a weapon that has the 2-Handed trait for its power, you may draw a card.

spellrager.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

spellrager.desc: You may bury a card to add 1d10 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">+1</label>) and the Electricity or Force trait to your Strength, Melee, or Arcane check; if the check has the Attack trait, you may recharge the card (□ or shuffle it into your deck) instead.

When you defeat a monster (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or acquire a spell),, you may move or put the bottom card of your deck on top of your deck, then end your turn.

<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label> You gain the skill Arcane: Charisma +3. (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>Add 1d6 to your check to recharge a spell.)
<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you defeat a non-summoned henchman or villain, you may draw a random spell that has the Arcane and Attack traits from the box.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may discard a boon that does not have the Attack trait to recharge a card from your discard pile that has the Attack trait (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>and draw a card).

basic.desc: Before your combat check, you may discard a card to draw a card that has the Arcane (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or Magic) trait from your discard pile.
You may automatically succeed at your check to recharge a spell (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or an item) that has the Attack trait.
When you acquire an ally (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or a spell), you may draw a card.

element master.desc: For your power feat, you may check any 1 of the traits below. That trait applies in any power that uses the word "mastered".
<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> You may add 1 mastered trait to your check.
Before your combat check, you may discard a card to draw a card that has the Arcane (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or Magic) trait from your discard pile.
You may automatically succeed at your check to recharge a spell (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or an item) that has the Attack trait.
When you acquire an ally (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or a spell), you may draw a card.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> Add 4 to your check that has a mastered trait.
Reduce damage of a mastered type dealt to you by 2 (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10">4</label>).

corruptor.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>

corruptor.desc: Before your combat check, you may discard a card to draw a card that has the Arcane (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or Magic) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>or Corrupted) trait from your discard pile.
You may automatically succeed at your check to recharge a spell (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or an item) that has the Attack trait.

When you acquire an ally (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or a spell) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or a card that has the Corrupted trait), you may draw a card.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> You may treat a card in your hand that has the Corrupted trait as if it has the same powers as the top (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or any) card in the blessings discard pile. This counts as playing a blessing.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> After the  rst exploration of your turn, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>and bottom card) of your location deck. (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>You may encounter 1 such card that has the Arcane or Corrupted trait.)

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>

basic.desc: When a character at your location would fail a check to defeat a bane, you may recharge a spell to allow that character to reroll the dice; that character takes the new result.

When you succeed at a Knowledge check, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or 2 cards) of your (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or any) location deck.

visionary.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>

visionary.desc: When a character at your location would fail a check to defeat a bane, you may recharge a spell to allow that character to reroll the dice; that character takes the new result.

When you succeed at a Knowledge check, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or 2 cards) of your (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or any) location deck. (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>If an examined card is a boon, you may exchange it for a random card of that type from the box without looking at it and put it on top of the location deck.)

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> When you (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or a character at your location) attempt(s) a check to defeat a barrier (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or close a location), you may use your Knowledge skill instead of the listed skill.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> Characters may gain the skill Knowledge: Wisdom +2 (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or Fortitude: Constitution +2) (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or Divine: Wisdom +3) while at your location.

spirit guide.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

spirit guide.desc: When a character at your location would fail a check to defeat a bane, you may recharge a spell to allow that character to reroll the dice; that character takes the new result.

When you succeed at a Knowledge check, you may examine the top card (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or 2 cards) of your (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>or any) location deck.
<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label> You gain the skill Arcane: Wisdom +1.

<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label> Discard a card to add 1d6 (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5">+2</label>) (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6">+4</label>) and the Mental trait to your combat check to defeat a monster.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you defeat a bane, you may recharge a spell from your discard pile (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>and draw a card).
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you play a blessing on a check to defeat a monster by another character at your location, add d12 instead of the normal die.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: Electricity, Fire, and Poison damage dealt to you is reduced by 3 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">5</label>).
You may evade your encounter (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>then if it is your turn, you may move).

When the cohort Arueshalae’s Gift is displayed next to a character’s deck, add 1d4 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+1</label>) to his checks that use a marked skill. At the start of your turn, you may add Arueshalae’s Gift to your hand.

fallen.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

fallen.desc: Electricity, Fire, and Poison damage dealt to you is reduced by 3 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">5</label>).
You may evade your encounter (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>then if it is your turn, you may move).

When the cohort Arueshalae’s Gift is displayed next to a character’s deck, add 1d4 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+2</label>) to his checks that use a marked skill. At the start of your turn, you may add Arueshalae’s Gift to your hand.

<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label> When you defeat a monster, you may recharge (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>or reveal) a card that has the Corrupted trait to recharge a random card from your discard pile.

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When another character fails a check to acquire an ally, you may discard (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or recharge) a card to automatically acquire that ally.

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> When you play a card, you may ignore the Corrupted trait on any card (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>and you may treat the top card of the blessings discard pile as if it has the Corrupted trait).

redeemed.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

redeemed.desc: Electricity, Fire, and Poison damage dealt to you is reduced by 3 (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1">5</label>).
You may evade your encounter (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>then if it is your turn, you may move).

When the cohort Arueshalae’s Gift is displayed next to a character’s deck, add 1d4 (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3">+1</label>) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4">+2</label>) to his checks that use a marked skill. At the start of your (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>or any) turn, you may add Arueshalae’s Gift to your hand.

<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label> Instead of your first exploration on a turn, you may reveal a card that has the Desna trait or a blessing to choose a character at your location. Shuffle 1d4+1 (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7">+2</label>) random cards from his discard pile into his deck, then discard the card you revealed (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>and that character may draw a card).

<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> At the start of your turn you may examine the top card of your location deck. If it is a boon, (<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label>you may) put it on the bottom of the location deck.

basic.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

basic.desc: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Animal or Basic trait (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or has an adventure deck number less than the current scenario), add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>1d6) to your check.
You may evade your encounter; shuffle the evaded card into a random open location, if it came from one.
When you discard (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or bury) 1 or more cards, you may draw a card.

poodlekiller.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox3" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox3"> Heavy Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

poodlekiller.desc: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Animal or Basic trait (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or has an adventure deck number less than the current scenario), add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>1d6) (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>1d8) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>1d10) to your check. (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>If you acquire a card that has the Animal trait, you may banish it to shuffle 1d4 random cards from your discard pile into your deck.)
You may evade your encounter; shuffle the evaded card into (<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label>or place it on top of) a random open location, if it came from one.
When you discard (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or bury) 1 or more cards, you may draw a card.

<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label> You may discard (□ or recharge) a weapon that has the Slashing trait to allow a character at your location to reroll 1 die (<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label>or 2 dice) on a combat check; that character takes the new result.

guttersnipe.name: Proficient
desc: <input id="profbox1" type="checkbox"/><label for="profbox1"> Light Armors</label>
<input id="profbox2" type="checkbox" checked disabled="disabled"/><label for="profbox2"> Weapons</label>

guttersnipe.desc: For your check that has or is against a card that has the Animal or Basic trait (<input id="powbox1" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox1"></label>or has an adventure deck number less than the current scenario), add 1d4 (<input id="powbox2" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox2"></label>1d6) to your check.

You may evade your encounter; shuffle the evaded card into a random open location, if it came from one. (<input id="powbox4" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox4"></label>Then you may examine the top card of your location.) (<input id="powbox5" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox5"></label>Then you may move.)

When you discard (<input id="powbox3" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox3"></label>or bury) 1 or more cards, you may draw a card. (<input id="powbox6" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox6"></label>Then you may recharge a card.)

<input id="powbox7" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox7"></label> When you attempt a check before you act against a bane (<input id="powbox8" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox8"></label>or to close a location), discard a card to use your Stealth skill instead of any listed skill.
<input id="powbox9" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox9"></label> During your give a card step, another character at your location may give you a card.

<input id="powbox10" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox10"></label> When a bane or boon would cause you to draw more than 1 random boon from the box, draw 1 (<input id="powbox11" type="checkbox" /><label for="powbox11"></label>or 2) more.

locations.name: Lair of the Vile and Vicious
